#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


The pieces of an enjoyable experience are all here, but unfortunately, Soulstice save itself on the Deck just yet.

- **Visuals:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)

- **Controls:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Battery:** ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)
